content: Figure 5  U.S. Consumer Prices    0    1    2    3    4  2005 2006 2007 2008 2009 2010  12-month percent change  Monthly  Core PCE price index  Core CPI  Market-based core PCE price index  FRB Dallas trimmed-mean PCE price index     Note: Core consumer price index (CPI) and core personal consumption expenditures (PCE) price index  exclude food and energy.      Source: Bureau of Economic Analysis; Bureau of Labor Statistics; Federal Reserve Bank (FRB) of Dallas.
